DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title of num01.xml</Title> <AutoTransition>30</AutoTransition> <!-- --> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>IoObject Title text02.xml </Title> <Description>IoObject Description text02.xml</Description> <TextArea id="textarea_id85"> <InitValue>initvalue01</InitValue> <MinLength>0</MinLength> <MaxLength>85</MaxLength> <Mask>false</Mask> <LetterTypes> <LetterType>LowerCase</LetterType> <LetterType>Numeric</LetterType> </LetterTypes> </TextArea> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
